aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa

So macht ein zweiter Teil Spaß. Alle aus dem Vorgänger beliebten Elemente sind vorhanden und wurden trotz der begrenzten Möglichkeit eines Testszenarios in eine witzige und coole Story verpackt die sogar interessante Wendepunkte aufweist. Hier ist einfach alles stimmig, Portal 2 ist ein vollkommen gelungener Nachfolger in der Reihe.
Einzig kam es mir so vor als währen in den Kammern etwas weniger Geschütze/Drohnen platziert worden als im ersten Teil.

Meine Wertung:
Steuerung 9/10
Story 9/10
Innovation 10/10
Begleiterwürfel 10/10 
Jack Blacks Synchronsprecher 11/10

Alles in allem -> Kauf das Game wenn du Puzzler magst.

A great game in the source engine with great puzzles and story. I also like how there is a coop mode and custom maps.
one of the highest quality games i have ever played. the magnum opus of puzzle games. 9.5/10
Bom!

if you're debating whether or not to buy this game, it's a must have. for only 10 bucks, this game is probably my favorite game in my library of over 60 games. the story line and lore are fleshed out, the mechanics and game play are addictive, and the characters are some of my favorite. still no cake though :(
I think we can put our differences behind us, for science, you monster.

I didn't think this game was as good as people said it was until I played it. I bought this game for about a dollar with extra credits that I had on steam. This game is now my second favorite of all time. Right after Zelda Breath of the Wild. The story, characters, and humor still stands out ten years later. The graphics stand the test of time, and could run at 30 fps on my potato 2004 acer laptop. I would've payed 60 us dollars for this game, It's way worth 10. I feel like I scammed Steam when I bought it for 1.
portal game make me happy

Literally the best puzzle game of all time. Play it.
好玩
game slaps 10/10

Local Splitscreen is broken.

Otherwise, the game runs great. The characters are fun, the writing is terrific, the mechanics are well thought out and well executed, and the overall experience is unique and exciting. I highly recommend this game, both for its singleplayer and multiplayer storylines, which is an interesting feature in and of itself. A good multiplayer story separate from the main story doesn't happen often, so this is a real treat to play with a friend.
hehe, wheatly funy
Best game ever in my life.
Fantastic story, so fun, good puzzles, must play. Play Portal 1 first though
Good

This is one of my favorite I've ever played, there's so much to love about it. The story is excellent, the humor is awesome, the characters are wholesome, game play is top notch, the music is phenomenal, the graphics are magnificent, the easter eggs are worth going out of your way to find them, the new features make the game infinity fun. And GLaDOS, my favorite part of the game, she's funny, she's interesting, and I love her change of heart at the end! (spoiler alert I guess.) All I want is some one in my friend group who wants to play with me... anyway 10/10 game would recommend!!!

经典之作，无需多言。后期略烧脑，但想通后，突然就焕然一新。山重水复疑无路，柳暗花明又一村。自己解出来挺有成就感的

Assim como disse sobre o primeiro jogo, não tenho novidade alguma pra dizer sobre, Portal 2 é outro clássico da Valve que todo mundo deveria jogar. Ele pega tudo o que deu certo no primeiro e melhora, principalmente a personalidade da GLaDOS e se beneficia muito da adição do Wheatley. Preço super acessível e em promoção fica mais barato ainda, recomendo a compra do Bundle.
better than portal

BEST GAME ON THE PLANET!!!

Very nice atmosphere and the puzzles are awesome and iconic, they are the perfect mix between not gonna take you a while, fun, but still challenging.
VERY good storyline, very iconic characters and still holds up over a decade later.
DEFINITELY worth the money. (also go buy portal 1 too if you have not)
Überragendes Spiel !!!

Even years after having first laid hands on this game, I revisit it consistently. The story is immaculate, the gameplay itself is fun and entertaining, and I always love a good puzzle. The portal mechanic itself never gets old, either. I would recommend this game to anyone, it's one of Valve's greatest and probably my all time favorite game.

Always enjoy coming back to playing through this game. Challenging, but satisfying when making it through each level. The story continuing from the first Portal is great and the sarcastic comments from Glados are on point. The Co-op is where I really found the fun to be had and why this game has grown to be much better then the first. Definitely worth your time and money!

It was superbly nice.
Puzzle was difficult enough, story was excellent, and characters are alive.

+ If you gonna play this game in notebook computer, then I want to suggest you to set the brightness to the maximum, because if you don't, more than 20% parts of this game are really really really dark.
My eyes were hurt, and I wasted too much time finding portal-able panels and surfaces hiding in the dark. 
They were revealed when I moderated the brightness....
